displayProperties.name: Countdown

"I hope the remaining Red Legion can see this: weapons they brought to destroy us, used as mere toys in training exercises. Do be mindful of the blast radius, though." —Lord Shaxx

displayProperties.name: Momentum Control
displayProperties.description:
"You've been capturing zones and destroying your enemies for a long time, haven't you? Let's pick up the pace a bit." —Lord Shaxx

Fight for Valor by capturing zones and defeating opponents. All weapons are more lethal, abilities replenish only on kills, and tracker is disabled.
